overview: Yoram Avidan, Founder & CEO, has 15 years experience with gaming and visualization technologies. Prior to Playce, he spent 6 years as CTO and VP R&D at Israeli defense contractor, a world leader in high-end 3D graphics and visualization systems for military simulators. Previously, Yoram was CTO and VP R&D at Pixel (acquired by TakeTwo). Yoram also served as a consultant to a Silicon Graphics / Nintendo JV, where he optimized the core graphics engine for the N64 game console. Yoram is a serial entrepreneur, having previously founded Optivera, which provided traffic management and optimization software for large optical networks, and Virtual Reality Development (acquired by Pixel), which developed 3D reconstruction software and a real-time animation engine.
